items.sentence: Tom says he wants to buy one of my paintings.
Tom says he wants to travel around the world.
Tom says that he and Mary almost got married.
Tom wanted to hit Mary, but John stopped him.
Tom was diagnosed with ASD when he was three.
Tom was probably very tired when he got home.
You don\'t know where Tom\'s home is, do you?
Why is it the mass media didn\'t report this?
I hope Tom doesn\'t get lost on his way here.
I know some of your students don\'t like you.
I know that you\'re currently writing a book.
I gave you a chance, but you didn\'t take it.
I get lonely when there\'s no one to talk to.
I get lonely when there\'s nobody to talk to.
I got a season\'s pass to all the home games.
Are you sure you don\'t want to come tonight?
Are you sure you don\'t want to go to Boston?
Are you sure you haven\'t forgotten anything?
Did you know that Tom used to live in Boston?
Did you tell Tom about seeing Mary in Boston?
